Sentencas: To lower operating temperatures of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs), the development of ion-conducting oxides with high conductivity and durability is desired.
Titulo: New ionic conductor: Ba-deficient Ba3Y4O9 with Zr substitution

Sentencas: In this work, we investigated Zr-substituted Ba3Y4O9 as an ionic conductor at intermediate temperatures and found that the Zr substitution for Y dramatically improves the phase stability in humidified atmospheres at 300-800 degrees C.
Titulo: New ionic conductor: Ba-deficient Ba3Y4O9 with Zr substitution

Sentencas: The total electrical conductivity of nominally 20 mol% Zr-substituted Ba3Y4O9 sample is about 0.1 mS/cm at 500 degrees C in both dry H-2 and O-2 atmospheres.
Titulo: New ionic conductor: Ba-deficient Ba3Y4O9 with Zr substitution

Sentencas: Because an increase in the conductivity in a humidified atmosphere was not observed, the conducting carriers may be oxygen ions.
Titulo: New ionic conductor: Ba-deficient Ba3Y4O9 with Zr substitution

Sentencas: Besides, in the Zr-substituted Ba3Y4O9 samples, we observed that BaO-rich phase coexists with the main phase whose composition is estimated to be Ba:(Y + Zr) similar to 2:3.
Titulo: New ionic conductor: Ba-deficient Ba3Y4O9 with Zr substitution

Sentencas: Therefore, the main conducting phase might be Ba-deficient Ba3Y4O9.
Titulo: New ionic conductor: Ba-deficient Ba3Y4O9 with Zr substitution

Sentencas: The mechanism of the ionic conduction and the improvement of chemical stability has not been revealed yet due to the lack of crystallographic information about the Ba-deficient phase.
Titulo: New ionic conductor: Ba-deficient Ba3Y4O9 with Zr substitution

Sentencas: While we are now working on further investigation, we promptly report the characteristic of the new compound.
Titulo: New ionic conductor: Ba-deficient Ba3Y4O9 with Zr substitution
